name: XPLOADER-BOT
description: Xploader, A modular advanced WhatsApp bot

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your Xploader session id here; must start with XPLOADER~

MONGODB_URL.description: Enter your MongoDB URL here or leave blank if you don't have

MODE.description: Set to 'private' to enable private mode, otherwise default is 'public'

AUTO_STATUS_VIEW.description: Set true to enable and false to disable auto status view

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true to enable and false to disable auto status reaction

ANTI_CALL.description: Set true to enable and false to disable anti-call feature

WELCOME_MSG.description: Set true to enable and false to disable welcome messages

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone here. Google or don't edit if you don't know!

COUNTRY_CODE.description: Set your country code for functionality of blockforeign and antiforeign commands

AUTO_BLOCK_FOREIGN.description: Set true to enable automatic blocking of foreign numbers

GC_ANTI_FOREIGN.description: Set true to enable automatic removal of foreign numbers from groups

AUTO_READ.description: Set true to enable automatic reading of messages
